name: time_table_sharing_webapp
description: personal learning project; utility: sharing timetables with michelle

scripts.dev-start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && esbuild src/index.js --bundle --outfile=dev_build/app.js --sourcemap=external --watch && source-map-explorer dev_build/app.js dev_build/app.js.map
scripts.dev-build: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && esbuild src/index.js --bundle --outfile=dev_build/app.js --sourcemap=external && source-map-explorer dev_build/app.js dev_build/app.js.map

author: Alexander Wedekind
